entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

entity.name: Scientists across the globe race the clock to develop coronavirus vaccine
entity.description: A team of infectious disease researchers at the University of Hong Kong claimed on Tuesday to have already finished developing a vaccine to treat the virus, but say "it will take a long time to test on animals" before it can be given to humans. As the clock ticks on and more people are infected, scientists worldwide are rushing to get any sort of experimental vaccine ready for human trial.

entity.name: How Chinese residents on lockdown manage the day-to-day amid the coronavirus outbreak
entity.description: The Chinese city of Wuhan, which is considered to be ground zero for the coronavirus outbreak, is in its 10th day of the government-imposed lockdown. From wearing PJs in public to avoiding hospitals, journalist @amyyqin shared how the city has transformed amid the epidemic.
